ygData.subject: IR

* While holding the kitten in her arms Iron Raptor payed close attention to 
Shadow Cat, making sure that she got every little thing that her friend 
said.
So those large machines were back? Just great!
Iron Raptor rolled her eyes and slumped her shoulders, wondering if anything 
else could happen that would be worse.
Just then she recieved the transmission from Hysteria, reporting that the 
base shields had just gone out and was now waiting for an order to take the 
ship off of LockDown.
< I had to ask...> was her only thoughts.
But if the larger bots came around they could start trouble with the 
Alliance again and with the CF like it was, there was slim chance that they 
could survive it.
Her eyes darted for a moment to Snow Tech as he plopped down beside her, 
seeing that he must be out of breath. But a lot had happened that day and 
everyone was bone tired, but since all they did for the past half hour was 
stand there they had just enough time.
Repairs came next.
Iron Raptor only nodded towards Shadow Cat and opened a communication link 
to Hysteria.*

" Deactivate LockDown, we'll be in shortly."

* Iron Raptor looked down at the tiny little kitten and a small smile 
developed on her lips, stroking a hand over his back again before she felt 
his tiny little claws dig into her arm.
She flinched for a moment but took the slight prick of pain, it wasn't 
anything worth fussing about.
Looking over towards Prowl she noticed a guest, one of the musicle bots 
which had communicated with them earlier?
With her expression lighthearted she nodded, looking past them all and to 
the battlefield for a moment before focusing on them again.*

" The more Maximals the better."

* This had been a long day and Iron Raptor felt her muscles relax as she 
continued to pet the kitten in her arms, letting out a sigh.
It was time to repair and take some relief time, for all of them. But not 
her, she had to get to work on the base, as well as changing the codes to 
the CF to a more proper design.
Maybe post a few auto-guns at a 5oo meter radiouse to the ship, something to 
back up the troops while in combat. Plus, maybe, a few more weapons to the 
ship itself.
Even with the battle over it was still going to be a long day.*
